subject: Testing server components with a Mock context
msgSnippet: Hi All, I m doing test cases for some server components that run in tomcat and that perform datasource lookup. Currently I m using simple-jndi without issue,
messageBody:
Hi All,
I'm doing test cases for some server components that run in tomcat and
that perform datasource lookup.
Currently I'm using simple-jndi without issue, but I saw there is also
a MockContext provided by mockEJB...

Are there other libraries that provided a simple context usable in a
testing environment ?

What do you think about simple-jndi vs MockEJB ? (note that I'm not
interesting in ejb)

Cheers,
ste
